summary: 2001 YEAR MODEL FORD F250.  DRIVER ATTEMPTED TO MAKE LEFT HAND TURN IN FRONT OF A MINIVAN.  THE DRIVER INDICATED THAT THE TRUCK WOULD NOT ACCELERATE AND CAUSED A HEAD-ON COLLISION AND KILLED THE DRIVER OF THE MINIVAN.  LATER, THE TRUCK WAS FOUND TO HAVE A FAULTY ACCELERATOR PEDAL ASSEMBLY KIT.
